Warner Bros. Water Tower - Wikipedia
s: February 25, 2025 - The Warner Bros. Water Tower is a historic water tower located at the Warner Bros. Studios in Burbank, California. Built in 1927, it stands 133 feet (41 meters) tall. The tank, which had a capacity of 100,000 U.S. gallons (380,000 L), is no longer used to hold water.

Water Tower | Warner Bros. Entertainment Wiki | Fandom
s: The Warner Bros. Water Tower is a historic water tower and located at the Warner Bros. lot in Burbank, California. Built in 1927, it stands 133 feet (40.5 meters) tall. The tank, which had a capacity of 100,000 gallons, is no longer used to hold water and has the WB shield on either side of it.
